game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.objective: Find the ancient scroll in the ruins of Eldarath
game.description: Legend has it that the city of Eldarath holds the secrets of the ancient world. Retrieve the lost scroll and unlock its secrets.
game.reward: 1000 gold pieces, a magical amulet, and increased reputation among the scholars' guild

tasks.description: Make your way through the treacherous jungle and find the entrance to the ancient city.
Navigate through the traps and puzzles within the ruins and find the chamber containing the ancient scroll.
Carefully take the scroll from its pedestal and be prepared to face any guardians of the ancient relic.
